subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrick Sharp scored his 16th goal of the season, steering in a loose puck off a rebound at 4 minutes 26 seconds of overtime to push the host Chicago Blackhawks past the San Jose Sharks, 3-2.
snippet: Patrick Sharp scored his 16th goal of the season, steering in a loose puck off a rebound at 4 minutes 26 seconds of overtime to push the host Chicago Blackhawks past the San Jose Sharks, 3-2.
